appDescription.message: A privacy-first visual text extractor that stays on your device

ui_processing.description: Island status when OCR is processing

ui_expand.description: Island hint text for expanding UI

ui_copied.description: Island status when OCR text copied to clipboard

ui_extracted.description: Island status when OCR extracted some text & not copied

ui_no_text.description: Island textarea message when OCR returns none

backup_tab_name.description: Name of newly created backup tab

backup_screenshot.description: Full screenshot covering 100% of backup tab

backup_banner.message: Original tab was protected. Using read-only screenshot.
